zetachain.title: What is ZetaChain?
zetachain.description: Universal Blockchain with native access to any chain, making crypto as accessible, diverse, and connected as the internet.

build.title: Why Build on ZetaChain?
build.description: Chain orchestration, cross-chain native token transfers, gasless execution environment.

evm.title: Universal EVM
evm.description: Smart contract platform with built-in interoperability.

app.title: Universal Apps
app.description: Apps that seamlessly interact with multiple blockchains, including Ethereum, Bitcoin, Solana, and more.
